oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Transition-metal saccharide chemistry: Synthesis and characterization of D-glucose, D-fructose, D-galactose, D-xylose, D-ribose, and maltose complexes of Ni(II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANDWAR, RP
RAO, CP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: iron(iii) complexes

monosaccharide
maltose
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Monosaccharide (D-Glc, D-Fru, D-Gal, D-Xyl, D-Rib) and disaccharide (Mal) complexes of Ni(II) were synthesised using [NEt(4)](2)[NiCl2Br2] or NiCl2 . 6H(2)O in nonaqueous medium. The compounds synthesised from these two starting materials are different. The isolated complexes were characterized by diffuse reflectance, aqueous solution absorbance, CD, FTIR, magnetic susceptibility, and EXAFS and XANES studies. (C) 1997 .
